MiniPoop.name: Alien Feces (Small)
MiniPoop.desc: A small quantity of fecal matter from alien fauna.

StalkerToy.name: Stalker Chew Toy
StalkerToy.desc: A large fish cast from solid titanium, coated in reflective materials to make it irresistible to stalkers.

FulguriteRod.name: Fulgurite Fuel Rod
FulguriteRod.desc: A special nuclear fuel blend that burns extremely quickly, releasing large amounts of energy for a short time.

WaterCooledRod.name: Water-Cooled Fuel Rod
WaterCooledRod.desc: A refined nuclear fuel item that produces slightly less power per time but lasts much longer.

ShieldedRod.name: Shielded Fuel Rod
ShieldedRod.desc: A nuclear fuel rod clad in thick leaded glass. No effect on power production but almost entirely eliminates ambient radiation.

IonRod.name: Nuclear Ion Fuel Rod
IonRod.desc: The ultimate in nuclear fuel technology, harnessing ion crystals to massively improve both the total energy output and power production rate of the nuclear reactor.

ReprocessedRod.name: Reprocessed Fuel Rod
ReprocessedRod.desc: Waste nuclear istopes, reprocessed to eke out the last bit of available energy.
